message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $110.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $120. This product is really worth it, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I understand your position, Alice. However, I still can't meet your price. I am willing to pay $115 for the product.
